title.rendered: Why Devika Sadar Bazaar is the Most Promising Project in Delhi

content.rendered:
Devika Sadar Bazaar is the Most Promising Project, Devika Group is one of the most esteemed builder’s groups in India has declared the commencement of their new project in the national capital. This project is theirs is going to be the best and biggest commercial hub in the Sadar Bazar region of Delhi state. With its international level world-class amenities, It has been claimed that this project is going to have something for everything from retailers to every visitor. Named Devika Sadar Bazaar, this project promises the retailers as well as the visitors here all kinds of facilities that they will ever require. Moreover, it already has the advantage of being the
oldest and most populated hub of the capital. Here are a few reasons why this project is a game-changer and why anyone should invest in this new project.

Most spacious commercial space
If you are a retailer and looking for the right place to invest in to put your shop or office, then you should know that the infrastructure of Devika Sadar Bazar is spread across a vast area of more than 1600 Sq. Yards which can nearly accommodate around 90 shops on the ground and first floor. Also, the population in the location is a win-win factor for the retailers as it will make the commute easy and there will be greater chances of increased footfall.

The build, decor and craftsmanship
Undoubtedly the infrastructure of Devika Sadar Bazar is one of its kind and worth appreciating every time you visit the place. The stunning interiors and the superior engineering which have been put into this project will blow your mind. The breathtaking craftsmanship enhances the visual beauty and the charisma of this commercial hub, resulting in this piece of art standing out in the crowd by the Devika Builders. Moreover, the concept of parking in this project is quite awesome. The commercial hub on the ground and first floor lies in between the parking spaces, which are in the minus two levels of the basement and second and third floor.

Also Read: Devika Sadar Bazaar | Brand New Commercial Complex

Food Court
Unquestionably, any commercial building is incomplete without a mesmerising food court. The grand food court is on the first level and the project has joined hands with various MNCs for its food court. Sadar Bazar area of Delhi is well-known for its food and this hub has kept the legacy quite well with the introduction of a food court, so the retailers with their shop in this project and visitors too will have a place to sit and have their favourite food.

Location
The key USP of this project is its location. This commercial hub is constructed in a location where it shares a close proximity to the most significant locations of Delhi like New Delhi railway station and New Delhi Metro station and also the most popular places of Delhi like Connaught Place and Indira Gandhi International airport are distanced 3 km and 16 km from Sadar Bazar respectively.

Security
Apart from superior craftsmanship and amazing interiors and infrastructure, this project is also going to provide you with hygienic toilets, power backup all the time, and all-time security to the retailers, their shops and visitors too. With all the security measures in place, the place is going to cater you a completely new and memorable shopping experience if you are a visitor or retailers too. With all the important factors in place, the opening of the grand project, Devika Sadar Bazar has been announced by the Devika group owner. Delhi is going to witness a new infrastructure rising in its Sadar Bazar region, promising around 1 lakh footfall every year. So, it is a great opportunity for the retailers to have their part in.
